name: The Garden (itch) (Palaeolak)
description:
A short extract from my video game The Garden. It's an exploration on the uncertainty of memory, the weight of language, and a longing to look back to a far distant past.

If you love poetry, gardens, dogs and video games, then download this and give it a try.

Follow me on insta: danieljamiepolak

Add my facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ochreshot

Portfolio: www.ochreshot.com

Love and peace, Dan
